__e: If you are organized this game to laugh at me, then you're a fool, Dario.
I only wish we could have caught the two of you together.
Not someone throwing them a curve ball at lunch about a Spanish petrochemical plant.
Have only 30 short minutes to trap murderer.
How could we lure the Captain of the Federation flagship unless we knew something of his background?
We've tried for six months to set up a bust, top to bottom.
The kids could've framed the guilty man.
I hate to see a human being trapped...
I could set them up for you.
And if they think they can get settlements out of me... when I've just been tricked into giving them 500 -
Instead I let myself get trapped and attacked.
I'm not trying to trick you and I didn't take it out of your desk.
Now whatever you do, you must not allow yourself to be trapped into looking at it.
